title: 1.142 STATE FLOWER.
text:
The pink and white lady slipper, Cypripedium reginae, is the official flower of the state of Minnesota.
A photograph of the pink and white lady slipper, obtained and approved by the commissioner of natural resources, shall be preserved in the Office of the Secretary of State.

variables.name: flower_name
variables.description: The name of the flower being referenced.

variables.name: state
variables.description: The state in which the flower is being considered official.

variables.name: flower_status
variables.description: The status of the flower as official or not.

variables.name: photo_approved
variables.description: Whether the photograph of the flower has been approved by the commissioner of natural resources.

consequences: The photograph of the pink and white lady slipper is preserved in the Office of the Secretary of State.
